application.translate: применение, приложение, заявка, заявление, прошение, применимость, просьба
examples: My application was lost in the post.
Please fill out this application.
The job takes a great deal of patience and application.
the application of new information
He sent in his job application late.
She filed an application with several employment agencies.
The practical application of spherics to navigation.
He filed an application to be admitted to the intensive course.
The research has many practical applications.
Don't forget to sign and date the application.
She was accused of lying on the employment application.
I've put in an application for a transfer.
I sent my application by registered mail.
I filled in the application form and sent it off.
Our loan application has been approved.
Double-click on an icon to launch an application.
Well, for starters, you'll need to fill out an application form.
the application of indexes to tables of data
It's obvious why his application was rejected.
The application of heat often helps sore muscles.
What's the latest news on your university application?
Rheumatic pains cured by the application of spirits of camphor.
a drug for topical (or local) application
Please detach and fill out the application form.
I mailed the application early yesterday morning.
I don't like having to reveal personal information when I fill in a job application.
Please fill out the attached application.
Please sign at the bottom of the application.
conscientious application to the work at hand
Application forms are available from the college.
